thread.title: Tips on using new iPhone feature for animating still photos - The New Zealand Herald
thread.title_full: Tips on using new iPhone feature for animating still photos - The New Zealand Herald - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: The New Zealand Herald
title: Tips on using new iPhone feature for animating still photos - The New Zealand Herald
text:
" If you're getting one of the new iPhones, you'll be able to turn still images into video. The iPhone 6s and 6s Plus, which start shipping Friday in the U.S. and other markets, automatically take three-second videos to accompany your regular shots, including selfies.
 The New Zealand Herald.
